intro: Create, decorate, and make your dream home come true!
description:
Design Your Dream Home!

Step into your cozy virtual house and unleash your creativity!

Decorate seven beautifully crafted rooms — living room, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, office, hallway, and veranda — each ready to reflect your unique style.

Pick your favorite wall colors, wallpapers, floors, rugs, and furniture to make each room truly your own. Experiment, mix styles, and see your dream home come to life!

Keep your favorite designs and return to them anytime.
Take a picture of your creation without menus or buttons in the way!

Outside your window, the world changes with four beautiful seasons – from sunny spring and summer, through colorful autumn, to snowy winter.

Easy to play, relaxing, and full of creativity – perfect for young decorators with big imaginations!

Decorate, play, and make your home the coziest place ever!
